long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JARVIS Concierge lives in JARVIS Chrome Extension to provide support anywhere anytime.

Open JARVIS Chrome Extension and chat with JARVIS Concierge to get help directly.

JARVIS Chrome Extension also consists of reporting issues, to do list and notification center.

JARVIS provides a smart way to report issues to internal service. You don't need to remember or ask who will be responsible of your issues. JARVIS will help to find the right contact window. JARVIS also keep you being focused on the tasks of internal services those await your actions.
long.zh_TW:
安裝JARVIS Chrome Extension讓趨勢人的線上管家JARVIS，直接常駐在你的Chrome瀏覽器上。

有任何問題可透過Chrome Extension直接循問JARVIS並取得JARVIS的協助。

JARVIS Chrome extension還能協助你回報公司內部系統問題，透過問題描述以及畫面截取來回報問題給該系統管理者。JARVIS能很聰明地自動偵測並聯繫負責該系統的團隊！除此之外，公司內部重要訊息、在等待員工審核或待處理的事項，JARVIS均會透過Chrome extension通知員工。
